text: Omar A. Aggad (20 April 1927 â€“ 1 February 2018) was a Saudi-born Palestinian businessman. He was the founder of Aggad Investment Company (AICO), and the founder and former chairman of Arab Palestinian Investment Company (APIC). Aggad died on 1 February 2018 in Toronto at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Palestinian people Category:Saudi Arabian businesspeople Category:Asian philanthropists
title: Omar Aggad
